useCase.name: Provide Server SLA to Data Contributors

preconditions.precondition: Repoadmin has access to SLA management section

mainSequence.step: Repoadmin accesses the SLA management section in the EDRMS Portal
EDRMS Portal retrieves the SLA details from the SLA Database
EDRMS Portal displays the SLA details to Repoadmin
Repoadmin selects the SLA details to share in the EDRMS Portal
Repoadmin provides the selected SLA details to the Data Contributor
Data Contributor acknowledges the receipt of the SLA details
